title: LF duo partner, Bronze to challenger!
body:
I am looking for someone that is willing to duo with a bronze 1, to prove that we bronzies/silvers can make it out of the hole we call elo hell. Playing for fun, but I am competitive and want to reach challenger.... eventually! :P 

I pretty much fill every role, so I am happy to go around your roles! 

Add me in game or send a message below if you are interested! I am on everynight!

replies.body: Bro i will hit you up in one hour! Just partied hard ðŸ˜†
same boat looking for someone to play for fun with competitive built in, where are u located?
Haha that's a funny question! I am located in melbourne!
bro added u add me back

My in game name is:

AcedVentura

I main bot most of the time but yeah im in the same boat as you. I really want to get a solid duo partner or maybe a group together, I used to have a group of mates I would play with but they stopped playing xD I'm on most nights so yeah add me if you're still keen!
Hey man! Sounds good! What time can you be on? I will be on after 10 pm VIC time.
What is your best role and champs?
woah, detail much. I main Supp/ Top. I'm keen to play with you.

Haha sorry for the detail :P
Well... you know now. xD 
Yes for sure! Add me in game!

I am on right now!
Usually after 7pm though!
Best of luck in your Ranked Climb!
